---
listing:
  type: table
  contents: posts/*.qmd
  table-hover: true
_quarto:
  tests:
    html:
      noErrors: true
      ensureHtmlElements:
        -
          - "a[href$='post-with-target.html'][target='_blank'][rel='noopener']"
          - "a[href$='post-without-target.html']:not([target]):not([rel])"
          - "tr[onclick*='window.open']"
---

## Table listing with target attribute test
